articles.title: Kim Jong Il sends wreath to bier of Im Rok Jae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il sends wreath to bier of Im Rok Jae 
    Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of Labour Hero, academician, prof. and dr. Im Rok Jae, president of the Central Cotanical Garden and concurrently president of the academy of Forestry Science, on Friday expressing deep condolences over his death.
 Im died of acute myocardial infraction at the age of 81 on January 17, Juche 91 (2002).   
 He was alternate member of the WPK central committee and deputy to the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.
